entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon then changing to flurries at times heavy later in the afternoon.
